benchmark_details.name: Forensics-Bench
benchmark_details.overview: Forensics-Bench is a new forgery detection benchmark suite designed to assess Large Vision Language Models (LVLMs) across a wide range of forgery detection tasks, requiring comprehensive recognition, location, and reasoning capabilities on diverse forgeries.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To comprehensively evaluate the discerning capabilities of LVLMs on forgery media.

data.source: Curated dataset of forgery images and associated multi-choice questions.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy calculated based on the number of correct responses over total questions.
methodology.interpretation: Higher accuracy indicates better performance of the LVLM in forgery detection tasks.
methodology.validation: Evaluated using competitive performance metrics against state-of-the-art LVLMs.
